verse.name: v1
verse.lines: It all starts with just one voice

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: That takes a stand that makes a choice

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: To live for God and not hesitate

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: To tell the world about amazing grace

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: One day that seed somehow breaks through

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Where there was one there now stand two

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: And soon another take his hand

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: A ray of hope that spreads across the land

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: Across the mountains

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: Across the sea

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: Soon others join in harmony

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: They found the cross still standing strong

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: And soon a mighty chorus sings along

verse.name: v14
verse.lines:
Go reach the world
touch one more soul

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: Bring one more lamb into the fold

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: Each soul another flag unfurled

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: Each voice another chance to reach the world

verse.name: v18
verse.lines:
Don't let me pray Lord
For wealth or fame

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: A sparks that sets the world a flame

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: Help me to reach the lost and alone

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: To tell of joy and hope where hope is gone

verse.name: v22
verse.lines:
Each voice another
Each voice another
Each voice another
